author: slava77
body:
- update PFCandidateWithSrcPtrFactory to make a candidate using the earliest but still available pointer
- bugfixes to pfTaus (EI) to make the right temporary products and use a correct input 
    - IIRC, these were made "so that it runs" initially when EI setup was introduced
- load a BTV computer  to the known ES

This now allows to run
```
cmsDriver.py remakeEI --conditions auto:phase1_2023_realistic --era Run3 -s EI\
 --eventcontent AODSIM --datatier AODSIM --filein file:aod.root --fileout file:aodEI.root -n -1
```
The executed set of modules looks relevant.

The PR is somewhat related to #28326 (in a way that with this PR merging of #28326 is much more straightforward)
title: fixes to allow running EI from AOD
